verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: North Korea] [V: says] [ARG1: President Donald Trump has agreed on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un.</p] >

< p > North Korea says President Donald Trump [V: has] agreed on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un.</p >

< p > North Korea says [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: agreed] [ARG1: on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea] [ARGM-PRP: in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un.</p] >
